pub.citation: Nickrent, D. L. and V. Malecot. 2001. A MOLECULAR PHYLOGENY OF SANTALALES.

pmmd.notes: Strict consensus of two trees (L = 3477) resulting from a MP heuristic search of a combined matrix of nuSSU rDNA and rbcL sequences for 58 Santalales and six outgroup taxa. Consistency index (minus uninformative sites) = 0.3612. Numbers above branches represent BS support (100 replicates). Branches without values had BS support less than 50%.
